text.modmenu.timeless.title: Timeless
timeless.config.description.useOldWorldM: Use the old Create New World menu.
timeless.config.description.disableHitDi:
Reintroduce the hit direction bug.
This restores the hit behaviour to how it was.
timeless.config.description.useOldWindow:
Use the old window icons that was
a crafting table.
timeless.config.description.doPistonClun:
Pistons emit a "clunk" sound and smoke
particles when they can't push a block.
This feature was mentioned in 2016
but never got implemented.
timeless.config.description.skeletonShoo:
Skeletons shoot purple arrow like they
used to in Survival Test.
timeless.config.description.useOldInvent:
§c§lWARNING: MIGHT CAUSE ISSUES WITH OTHER MODS
§fUse the old inventory layout.
timeless.config.description.useOldScreen: Use the old backgrounds screens used to have.
timeless.config.description.disableEnvir:
Removes the environmental fog that adds
a blue-ish tint to far blocks.
timeless.selectWorld.gameMode.hardcore.l: Same as Survival Mode, locked at hardest
You can look but don't touch
